div.style: font-size: small; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

strong.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial; font-size: large; letter-spacing: 0.3px;

br.span: We are PROUD to introduce the Valedictorian, Myles Buchhorn and Salutatorian Alexis Gielbunt, for the Bartlett High School Class of 2020!!

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

strong.span:
Monday April 27, 2020
ACE Activities
Tuesday April 21, 2020
ACE Activities

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-weight: 700; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

div.span: Good afternoon!

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: PLEASE complete the appropriate ACE survey below. There is a survey for parents (both in English and in Spanish), one for staff, and one for students.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.br: Students especially: please take the survey so we can make the program better and more meaningful for you and your families.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: Please feel free to share these links with your family and friends. You may take the survey on any device.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
div.span: I appreciate each of you!

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 250); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

div.span: ¡Buenas tardes!

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 250); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

div.span: POR FAVOR complete la encuesta ACE apropiada a continuación. Hay una encuesta para padres (tanto en inglés como en español), una para el personal y otra para los estudiantes.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 250); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

div.span: Estudiantes especialmente: responda la encuesta para que podamos hacer que el programa sea mejor y más significativo para usted y sus familias.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 250); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

div.span: No dude en compartir estos enlaces con su familia y amigos. Puede realizar la encuesta en cualquier dispositivo.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 250); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

div.span: ¡Aprecio a cada uno de ustedes!

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: The deadline for giving feedback for the ACE program has been extended! Please complete the appropriate survey before April 12. Thank you - your feedback is so important in helping to make the program better and better!

hr.span:
Monday March 30, 2020
Message to Families Letter
Wednesday March 23, 2020

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span:
Reminders for the Week:
Weekly food Pick up is tomorrow March 24, 2020 from 7 am -- 9 am or 4 pm -- 6 pm at the BISD Cafeteria or First Baptist Church.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span:
Elementary bag pick ups will happen tomorrow March 24, 2020 from 7 am -- 9 am or 4 pm -- 6 pm in the drop off lane by the elementary.
For both food pick up and bag pick up, please don't exit your car, we will bring everything to you.
For questions or more information regarding your child's assignments you may contact your campus principal:
Elementary: Angie Peace
254-217-3346
Secondary: Austin Crawley
254-300-8391

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

em.span: Bored? Need a break from the screen? Gather some easy supplies and create great science fun!

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
div.em: A reminder that we will resume ACE programming as soon as we are able. Let me know how we can help make time at home more fun for everyone!

hr.hr:
Wednesday March 18, 2020
Extended School Closure through April 3rd can be found here.
Letter
Attention Parents!

span.br:
We are working to get all parents connected with their child's teachers as quickly as possible. If you could please take a few minutes and complete this quick form, we will be able to update contact information more quickly.
Thank you!
If you have any question please contact us!

All grade levels can expect to have assignments ready on Wednesday March 18, 2020.
(if needed... Elementary students who will need hard printed materials will be able to pick them up next week Tuesday).
Please check your school email accounts, joining remind accounts for your teachers, and looking for updates to the school website.
Attention:
Pick will be Every Tuesday
Pick up times:
7:00 am -- 9:00 am
4:00 pm -- 6:00 pm
Pick up Locations:
Drive Through Cafeteria
Drive Through First Baptist Church in Bartlett
Workout from home for the Extended Spring Break
3/15/2020 Community Update #1 from Superintendent Mr. Clevenger
Information regarding the School closure can be found here.
Letter
Coronavirus (COVID-19)
